resources.string:
ustomer Obsession: ○ Pivot sql implemented in pinacle module • Ownership: ○ Party module while HCL…went live…. • Are Right a Lot ○ Small Animation for 3 years old application • Learn and be curious ○ Add new technology for long term fix while sprint plan (Ag-Grid/d3/joint.js) • Hire and Develop the best ○ TCS - iOS offshore development and get the onsite opportunity • Insist on the highest standards ○ Code quality ○ Eslint , unit test and functional testing automated while deployment script written • Think Big ○ Data API with performance test and connection pooling and graphQL filter • Bias for action ○ API caching or add filter and load balancer • Frugality ○ Spend resource based on the need • Earn Trust ○ I have created a video while went tour ○ Hear every one data point and take dissection • Dive deep ○ Production support ○ Tell about the last name email issue
• Have backbone, disagree and commit ○ You should not shy with majority of the forums • Deliver result on time result with proper plan and execution
